provider.name: Anthropic
provider.description: Anthropic's latest features and APIs are supported on Portkey.

models.title: Claude 3 & 3.1 Models (supports Vision capabilities)
models.description: Portkey suports all the latest Claude series of models by Anthropic

models.title: Text Completions
models.description: Portkey suports all text completions models offered by Anthropic

features.title: Function / Tool Calling
features.description: Function calling allows you to connect models like Claude-3.5-Sonnet to external tools and systems.

features.title: Parallel Function / Tool Calling
features.description: With this feature you can generate multiple function calls in a single respons

features.title: Prompt Caching
features.description: Prompt caching optimizes your API usage by allowing resuming from specific prefixes in your prompts.

portkeyPythonSDK.description: Use Portkey Python SDK to make text calls to Anthropic models
portkeyPythonSDK.codeExample: sample python code for claude-3-5-sonnet-20240620 call on Anthropic

integrationViaVirtualKey.description: Integrate Anthropic using Portkey's virtual key system

inline.text: Get your API key from Anthropic and add it to Portkey to create a virtual key.
inline.description: You can get your Anthropic API key from the Anthropic website [here](https://console.anthropic.com/settings/keys).

portkeyPythonSDK.description: Initialize Portkey with the virtual key in Python
portkeyPythonSDK.codeExample: sample python SDK code for claude-3-5-sonnet-20240620 chat completions call on Anthropic using virtual key

portkeyNodeSDK.description: Initialize Portkey with the virtual key in Node.js
portkeyNodeSDK.codeExample: sample node.js SDK code for claude-3-5-sonnet-20240620 chat completions call on Anthropic using virtual key

restAPI.description: Use Portkey's REST API to make text calls to Anthropic chat completions models like claude-3-5-sonnet-20240620
restAPI.codeExample: sample rest api code for claude-3-5-sonnet-20240620 chat completions call on Anthropic using virtual key
